n, m = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
a = int(input(), 2)
b = int(input(), 2)

ans = 0
while b:
    ans += a & b
    b >>= 1
    ans %= 998244353

print(ans)

# SOLUTION
n, m = map(int, input().split())
a = list(input())
b = list(input())
ans = 0
while b[-1] == '1':
    ans += int(a,2) & int(''.join(b),2)
    b.pop()
print(ans % 998244353)

def main():
    """
    This is the main function.
    """
    n, m = map(int, input().split())
    a = input()
    b = input()
    ans = 0
    while b != '0':
        ans += int(a, 2) & int(b, 2)
        b = bin(int(b, 2) // 2)[2:]
    print(ans % 998244353)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

n,m = map(int,input().split())
a = int(input(),2)
b = int(input(),2)

ans = 0
while b != 0:
    ans += a & b
    b >>= 1
print(ans % 998244353)

n, m = map(int, input().split())
a = input()
b = input()

ans = 0

while int(b, 2) > 0:
    ans += int(a, 2) & int(b, 2)
    b = bin(int(b, 2) // 2)[2:]

print(ans)

def solve():
    n, m = map(int, input().split())
    a = input()
    b = input()
    ans = 0
    while b != '0':
        ans += int(a, 2) & int(b, 2)
        b = b[:-1]
    print(ans % 998244353)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    solve()

n,m = map(int,input().split())
a = input()
b = input()

a = int(a,2)
b = int(b,2)

ans = 0
while b > 0:
    ans = (ans + (a&b))%998244353
    b = b>>1

print(ans)
